ISSUE.TITLE: dse command does not function on readOnlyRootFilesystem
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The dse command requires the $HOME to be writable, but that is not allowed by the readOnlyRootFilesystem. We need to patch and remove this requirement. ┆Issue is synchronized with this [Jira Story](https://datastax.jira.com/browse/MAPI-113) by [Unito](https://www.unito.io) ┆Issue Number: MAPI-113

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove DSE requirement to have writable $HOME (#630) * Remove DSE requirement to have writable $HOME
